name: Lease Report
query:
SELECT
    airport,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Available' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS available_shops,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'Occupied' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS occupied_shops,
    COUNT(*) AS total_shops
FROM
    `tabShop`
GROUP BY
    airport
ORDER BY
    airport;
